mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.tech_id AS "techId", a.tech_name AS "techName", a.service_city_id AS "serviceCityId", a.service_city_name AS "serviceCityName", a.job_natrue AS "jobNatrue", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.station_name AS "stationName", a.job_status AS "jobStatus", a.work_time AS "workTime", a.in_job_time AS "inJobTime", a.assess_grade AS "assessGrade", a.exper_desc AS "experDesc", a.sort AS "sort", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_technician_service_info( id, tech_id, tech_name, service_city_id, service_city_name, job_natrue, station_id, station_name, job_status, work_time, in_job_time, assess_grade, exper_desc, sort, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{techId}, #{techName}, #{serviceCityId}, #{serviceCityName}, #{jobNatrue}, #{stationId}, #{stationName}, #{jobStatus}, #{workTime}, #{inJobTime}, #{assessGrade}, #{experDesc}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE service_technician_service_info SET tech_id = #{techId}, tech_name = #{techName}, service_city_id = #{serviceCityId}, service_city_name = #{serviceCityName}, job_natrue = #{jobNatrue}, station_id = #{stationId}, station_name = #{stationName}, job_status = #{jobStatus}, work_time = #{workTime}, in_job_time = #{inJobTime}, assess_grade = #{assessGrade}, exper_desc = #{experDesc}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
